questionsList.question: Which one of the following is most associated with informational social influence? [1 mark]
questionsList.correct_answer: It is more likely to lead to a permanent, rather than temporary, change in attitude.
questionsList.answer_option_1: It is based on a desire to be liked, rather than a desire to be right
questionsList.answer_option_2: It is an emotional, rahter than cognitive, process
questionsList.answer_option_3: It is more likely to lead to a permanent, rather than temporary, change in attitude.
questionsList.answer_option_4: It occurs in unambiguous situations, rather than those where there is no obvious answer

questionsList.question: Which of the following neurons carries electrical impulses towards the brain? [1 mark]
Which of the following is NOT a way of studying the brain [1 mark]
Which of the following statements is correct according to the psychodynamic approach? [1 mark]
questionsList.correct_answer: The id is part of the unconscious mind
questionsList.answer_option_1: The ego is present at birth
questionsList.answer_option_2: The id is based on the morality principle
questionsList.answer_option_3: The id is part of the unconscious mind
questionsList.answer_option_4: The superego mediates between the demands of the id and ego

questionsList.question: Which of the following terms best represents the view that biology and environment work together to determine behaviour? [1 mark]
